questions.question: Standard question without any media?
questions.explanation: This is a regular question without any media attachments

questions.question: What do you see in this local image?
questions.explanation: This demonstrates how local images are displayed in quiz questions

questions.question: What do you hear in this local audio clip?
questions.explanation: This demonstrates how local audio files are handled in quiz questions. Note that the timer doesn't run for audio questions.

questions.question: Question with both local image and audio?
questions.explanation: This shows how a question can have both local image and audio elements

questions.question: Final regular question?
questions.explanation: Back to a standard question format
